name: streams
description: Utility methods for working with iterables as streams.

scripts.doc: sed 's/http:\/\/htmlpreview\.github\.io\/?https:\/\/github.com\/blutorange\/js-streams\/blob\/doc/./g' README.md  > README.typedoc && npx typedoc --mode modules --name js-streams --readme README.typedoc --out doc --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeProtected ./*.ts
scripts.web: npx babel dist/node/*.js --out-dir dist/web/ && npx browserify dist/web/main.js --standalone Streams -o dist/streams.js && npx minify dist/streams.js --out-file dist/streams.min.js
scripts.build: npm run doc ; npm run transpile; npm run web

author: Andre Wachsmuth
